###
### All (Limited-Time) Event Spawns
###
### Enables Bloody Harvest, Broken Hearts, and Revenge of the Cartels spawn
### modifications at the same time.  Shouldn't require the events to be
### actually active in order to work.  Enemies *can* be both Haunted and
### Cartel, fwiw!
###
### This should appear in your modlist *after* any mod which enables an event,
### otherwise this statement will get overwritten.
###
### Generated by gen_all_event_spawns.py
###

SparkPatchEntry,(1,1,0,),/Game/GameData/Spawning/GlobalSpawnDLCData.GlobalSpawnDLCData,DLCs,0,,((Data=/Game/PatchDLC/BloodyHarvest/GameData/SpawnDLCScripts/SpawnDLC_BloodyHarvest.SpawnDLC_BloodyHarvest,IsEnabled=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000)),(Data=/Game/PatchDLC/EventVDay/GameData/SpawnDLCScripts/SpawnDLC_VDay.SpawnDLC_VDay,IsEnabled=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000)),(Data=/Game/PatchDLC/Event2/GameData/SpawnDLCSCripts/SpawnDLC_Cartels.SpawnDLC_Cartels,IsEnabled=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000)))
